### Problem 1


#### Reading in the data:

```{r}
homicide_data = read_csv(file = "./data/homicide_data.csv")
```


Creating city, state variable

```{r}
homicide_data %>% 
  mutate(city_state = paste(city, state, sep = ','))
```
